00117 void eol_component_config()
00118 {
00119   eolLine buf;
00120   eolLine sliderVfile,sliderVhighfile,sliderHfile,sliderHhighfile;
00121   eolConfig *conf = NULL;
00122   
00123   eol_line_cpy(sliderVfile,"images/UI/slider_v.png");
00124   eol_line_cpy(sliderVhighfile,"images/UI/slider_v_high.png");
00125   eol_line_cpy(sliderHfile,"images/UI/slider.png");
00126   eol_line_cpy(sliderHhighfile,"images/UI/slider_high.png");
00127   
00128   conf = eol_config_load("system/component.cfg");
00129   if (conf != NULL)
00130   {
00131     eol_button_configure(conf);
00132     eol_config_get_line_by_tag(buf,conf,"slider_verticle");
00133     if (strlen(buf) > 0)
00134     {
00135       eol_line_cpy(sliderVfile,buf);
00136     }
00137     eol_config_get_line_by_tag(buf,conf,"slider_verticle_high");
00138     if (strlen(buf) > 0)
00139     {
00140       eol_line_cpy(sliderVhighfile,buf);
00141     }
00142     eol_config_get_line_by_tag(buf,conf,"slider_horizontal");
00143     if (strlen(buf) > 0)
00144     {
00145       eol_line_cpy(sliderHfile,buf);
00146     }
00147     eol_config_get_line_by_tag(buf,conf,"slider_horizontal_high");
00148     if (strlen(buf) > 0)
00149     {
00150       eol_line_cpy(sliderHhighfile,buf);
00151     }
00152     
00153     eol_config_free(&conf);
00154   }
00155 
00156   _eol_component_slider[0] = eol_sprite_load(sliderVfile,-1,-1);
00157   _eol_component_slider[1] = eol_sprite_load(sliderVhighfile,-1,-1);
00158   _eol_component_slider[2] = eol_sprite_load(sliderHfile,-1,-1);
00159   _eol_component_slider[3] = eol_sprite_load(sliderHhighfile,-1,-1);
00160   eol_line_cpy(_eol_component_slider_files[0],sliderVfile);
00161   eol_line_cpy(_eol_component_slider_files[1],sliderVhighfile);
00162   eol_line_cpy(_eol_component_slider_files[2],sliderHfile);
00163   eol_line_cpy(_eol_component_slider_files[3],sliderHhighfile);
00164   
00165 }

00167 eolComponent * eol_component_new()
00168 {
00169   eolComponent *component = NULL;
00170   component = (eolComponent *)malloc(sizeof(eolComponent));
00171   if (component == NULL)
00172   {
00173     eol_logger_message(
00174       EOL_LOG_ERROR,
00175       "eol_component: failed to allocate new component!\n");
00176     return NULL;
00177   }
00178   memset(component,0,sizeof(eolComponent));
00179   return component;
00180 }

00182 void eol_component_free(eolComponent **component)
00183 {
00184   if ((!component)||(!*component))return;
00185   if ((*component)->data_free != NULL)
00186   {
00187     (*component)->data_free(*component);
00188   }
00189   free(*component);
00190   *component = NULL;
00191 }

00289 void eol_component_label_free(eolComponent *component)
00290 {
00291   eolComponentLabel *label = eol_component_get_label_data(component);
00292   if (label == NULL)return;
00293   if (label->buffer != NULL)free(label->buffer);
00294   if (label->font != NULL)eol_font_free(&label->font);
00295   free(label);
00296   label = NULL;
00297   component->componentData = NULL;
00298 }

00320 void eol_component_slider_free(eolComponent *component)
00321 {
00322   eolComponentSlider *slider = eol_component_get_slider_data(component);
00323   if (slider == NULL)return;
00324   eol_sprite_free(&slider->slider);
00325   eol_sprite_free(&slider->sliderHigh);
00326   eol_sprite_free(&slider->bar);
00327   eol_sprite_free(&slider->cap1);
00328   eol_sprite_free(&slider->cap2);
00329   free(slider);
00330   component->componentData = NULL;
00331 }

00351 void eol_component_slider_draw(eolComponent *component, eolRect bounds)
00352 {
00353   eolRect r;
00354   eolVec2D drawPosition;
00355   eolComponentSlider *slider = eol_component_get_slider_data(component);
00356   if (slider == NULL)return;
00357   eol_rect_copy(&r,bounds);
00358   if (slider->vertical)
00359   {
00360     r.w = bounds.w * 0.5;
00361     r.x += r.w * 0.5;
00362     drawPosition.x = r.x + (r.w * 0.5);
00363     drawPosition.y = r.y + (r.h * slider->position);
00364   }
00365   else
00366   {
00367     r.h = bounds.h * 0.5;
00368     r.y += r.h * 0.5;
00369     drawPosition.y = r.y + (r.h * 0.5);
00370     drawPosition.x = r.x + (r.w * slider->position);
00371   }
00372   
00373   eol_draw_solid_rect(r,slider->barColor,1);
00374   eol_draw_rect(r,eol_vec3d(1,1,1),1);
00375   if (slider->sliderState == eolSliderIdle)
00376   {
00377     if (slider->slider != NULL)
00378     {
00379       drawPosition.x -= slider->slider->frameWidth / 2;
00380       drawPosition.y -= slider->slider->frameHeight / 2;
00381       eol_sprite_draw(slider->slider,0,drawPosition.x,drawPosition.y);
00382     }
00383     else
00384     {
00385       /*TODO: draw a slider*/
00386     }
00387   }
00388   else
00389   {
00390     if (slider->sliderHigh != NULL)
00391     {
00392       drawPosition.x -= slider->sliderHigh->frameWidth / 2;
00393       drawPosition.y -= slider->sliderHigh->frameHeight / 2;
00394       eol_sprite_draw(slider->sliderHigh,0,drawPosition.x,drawPosition.y);
00395     }
00396     else
00397     {
00398       /*TODO: draw a slider*/
00399     }
00400   }
00401 }
00402 
00403 void eol_component_entry_draw(eolComponent *component, eolRect bounds)
00404 {
00405   eolRect r;
00406   eolComponentEntry *entry = eol_component_get_entry_data(component);
00407   if (entry == NULL)return;
00408   r.x = bounds.x - 1;
00409   r.y = bounds.y - 1;
00410   r.w = bounds.w + 2;
00411   r.h = bounds.h + 2;
00412   eol_draw_solid_rect(r,eol_vec3d(1,1,1),1);
00413   eol_draw_solid_rect(bounds,entry->bgcolor,1);
00414   if (entry->buffer->len <= 0)return;
00415   if (entry->font == NULL)
00416   {
00417     if (entry->wordWrap)
00418     {
00419       eol_font_draw_text_block(
00420       entry->buffer->str,
00421       bounds.x,
00422       bounds.y,
00423       bounds.w,
00424       0,
00425       entry->color,
00426       entry->alpha,
00427       entry->fontSize
00428       );
00429     }
00430     else
00431     {
00432       eol_font_draw_text_justify(
00433         entry->buffer->str,
00434         bounds.x,
00435         bounds.y,
00436         entry->color,
00437         entry->alpha,
00438         entry->fontSize,
00439         entry->justify
00440       );
00441     }
00442   }
00443   else
00444   {
00445     if (entry->wordWrap)
00446     {
00447       eol_font_draw_text_block_custom(
00448         entry->buffer->str,
00449         bounds,
00450         entry->color,
00451         entry->alpha,
00452         entry->font
00453       );
00454     }
00455     else
00456     {
00457       eol_font_draw_text_justify_custom(
00458         entry->buffer->str,
00459         bounds.x,
00460         bounds.y,
00461         entry->color,
00462         entry->alpha,
00463         entry->font,
00464         entry->justify
00465       );
00466     }
00467   }
00468 }

00470 void eol_component_label_draw(eolComponent *component, eolRect bounds)
00471 {
00472   eolComponentLabel *label = eol_component_get_label_data(component);
00473   if (label == NULL)return;
00474   if (label->buffer == NULL)return;
00475   if (label->font == NULL)
00476   {
00477     if (label->wordWrap)
00478     {
00479       eol_font_draw_text_block(
00480       label->buffer->str,
00481       component->bounds.x,
00482       component->bounds.y,
00483       component->bounds.w,
00484       0,
00485       label->color,
00486       label->alpha,
00487       label->fontSize
00488       );
00489     }
00490     else
00491     {
00492       eol_font_draw_text_justify(
00493         label->buffer->str,
00494         component->bounds.x,
00495         component->bounds.y,
00496         label->color,
00497         label->alpha,
00498         label->fontSize,
00499         label->justify
00500       );
00501     }
00502   }
00503   else
00504   {
00505     if (label->wordWrap)
00506     {
00507       eol_font_draw_text_block_custom(
00508         label->buffer->str,
00509         component->bounds,
00510         label->color,
00511         label->alpha,
00512         label->font
00513       );
00514     }
00515     else
00516     {
00517       eol_font_draw_text_justify_custom(
00518         label->buffer->str,
00519         component->bounds.x,
00520         component->bounds.y,
00521         label->color,
00522         label->alpha,
00523         label->font,
00524         label->justify
00525       );
00526     }
00527   }
00528 }
00529 
00530 void eol_component_draw(eolComponent *component,eolRect bounds)
00531 {
00532   eolRect drawRect;
00533   if (!component)return;
00534   if (component->data_draw == NULL)return;
00535   drawRect.x = bounds.x + (bounds.w * component->rect.x);
00536   drawRect.y = bounds.y + (bounds.h * component->rect.y);
00537   if(component->rect.w <= 1)
00538     drawRect.w = (bounds.w * component->rect.w);
00539   else drawRect.w = component->rect.w;
00540   if(component->rect.h <= 1)
00541     drawRect.h = (bounds.h * component->rect.h);
00542   else drawRect.h = component->rect.h;
00543   component->data_draw(component,drawRect);
00544 }
00545 
00546 /*
00547 
00548   ***** Update *****
00549   
00550  */
00551 
00552 
00553 eolBool eol_component_slider_update(eolComponent *component)
00554 {
00555   eolComponentSlider *slider;
00556   eolRect sliderRect;
00557   eolVec2D drawPosition;
00558   eolInt x = 0,y = 0;
00559   if (!component)return eolFalse;
00560   slider = eol_component_get_slider_data(component);
00561   if (slider == NULL)return eolFalse;
00562   eol_mouse_get_position(&x,&y);
00563   
00564   if (slider->vertical)
00565   {
00566     drawPosition.x = component->bounds.x + (component->bounds.w * 0.5);
00567     drawPosition.y = component->bounds.y + (component->bounds.h * slider->position);
00568   }
00569   else
00570   {
00571     drawPosition.y = component->bounds.y + (component->bounds.h * 0.5);
00572     drawPosition.x = component->bounds.x + (component->bounds.w * slider->position);
00573   }
00574   
00575   if (slider->slider != NULL)
00576   {
00577     sliderRect.x = drawPosition.x - (slider->slider->frameWidth /2);
00578     sliderRect.y = drawPosition.y - (slider->slider->frameHeight /2);
00579     sliderRect.w = slider->slider->frameWidth;
00580     sliderRect.h = slider->slider->frameHeight;
00581   }
00582   else
00583   {
00584     /*TODO: support drawn sliders*/
00585   }
00586   if ((slider->sliderState == eolSliderHeld) && (eol_mouse_input_released(eolMouseLeft)))
00587   {
00588     return eolTrue;
00589   }
00590   if ((slider->sliderState == eolSliderHeld) && (eol_mouse_input_held(eolMouseLeft)))
00591   {
00592     slider->oldPosition = slider->position;
00593     if (slider->vertical)
00594     {
00595       if (y < component->bounds.y)y = component->bounds.y;
00596       if (y > component->bounds.y + component->bounds.h)y = component->bounds.y + component->bounds.h;
00597       y -= component->bounds.y;
00598       if (component->bounds.h != 0)slider->position = (float)y / component->bounds.h;
00599     }
00600     else
00601     {
00602       if (x < component->bounds.x)x = component->bounds.x;
00603       if (x > (component->bounds.x + component->bounds.w))x = component->bounds.x + component->bounds.w;
00604       x -= component->bounds.x;
00605       if (component->bounds.w != 0)slider->position = (float)x / component->bounds.w;
00606     }
00607     return eolFalse;
00608   }
00609   if (eol_mouse_in_rect(sliderRect))
00610   {
00611     slider->sliderState = eolSliderHigh;
00612     if (eol_mouse_input_pressed(eolMouseLeft))
00613     {
00614       slider->sliderState = eolSliderHeld;
00615     }
00616   }
00617   else
00618   {
00619     slider->sliderState = eolSliderIdle;
00620   }
00621   return eolFalse;
00622 }
00623 
00624 void eol_entry_delete_char(eolComponent *component)
00625 {
00626   eolComponentEntry *entry;
00627   if (!component)return;
00628   entry = eol_component_get_entry_data(component);
00629   if (entry == NULL)return;
00630   if (entry->buffer->len <= 0)return;
00631   entry->buffer = g_string_erase(entry->buffer,(entry->buffer->len - 1),1);
00632   if (entry->buffer == NULL)
00633   {
00634     eol_logger_message(
00635       EOL_LOG_ERROR,
00636       "eol_component:failed to delete a character in entry\n");
00637   }
00638 }
00639 
00640 void eol_entry_append_char(eolComponent *component,
00641                            char          newchar)
00642 {
00643   eolComponentEntry *entry;
00644   entry = eol_component_get_entry_data(component);
00645   if (entry == NULL)return;
00646   if (entry->buffer->len >= entry->bufferLimit)return;
00647   entry->buffer = g_string_append_c(entry->buffer,newchar);
00648 }
00649 
00650 eolBool eol_component_entry_update(eolComponent *component)
00651 {
00652   eolUI8 key;
00653   char let;
00654   eolComponentEntry *entry;
00655   
00656   if (!component)return eolFalse;
00657   entry = eol_component_get_entry_data(component);
00658   if (entry == NULL)return eolFalse;
00659   if (eol_input_is_key_released(SDLK_BACKSPACE))
00660   {
00661     eol_entry_delete_char(component);
00662     return eolFalse;
00663   }
00664   if (eol_input_is_key_released(SDLK_PERIOD))
00665   {
00666     eol_entry_append_char(component,'.');
00667     return eolFalse;
00668   }
00669   if (eol_input_is_key_released(SDLK_MINUS))
00670   {
00671     eol_entry_append_char(component,'-');
00672     return eolFalse;
00673   }
00674   for (key = SDLK_0;key <= SDLK_9;key++)
00675   {
00676     if (eol_input_is_key_released(key))
00677     {
00678       let = key - SDLK_0 + '0';
00679       eol_entry_append_char(component,let);
00680       return eolFalse;
00681     }
00682   }
00683   if (entry->number)return eolFalse;
00684   if (eol_input_is_key_released(SDLK_SPACE))
00685   {
00686     eol_entry_append_char(component,' ');
00687     return eolFalse;
00688   }
00689   if (eol_input_is_key_released(SDLK_COMMA))
00690   {
00691     eol_entry_append_char(component,',');
00692     return eolFalse;
00693   }
00694   if (eol_input_is_key_released(SDLK_COLON))
00695   {
00696     eol_entry_append_char(component,':');
00697     return eolFalse;
00698   }
00699   for (key = SDLK_a;key <= SDLK_z;key++)
00700   {
00701     if (eol_input_is_key_released(key))
00702     {
00703       if (eol_input_is_mod_down(KMOD_SHIFT))
00704       {
00705         let = key - SDLK_a + 'A';
00706       }
00707       else
00708       {
00709         let = key - SDLK_a + 'a';
00710       }
00711       eol_entry_append_char(component,let);
00712       return eolFalse;
00713     }
00714   }
00715   return eolFalse;
00716 }
00717 
00718 void eol_entry_assign_output(eolComponent *component)
00719 {
00720   eolComponentEntry * entry = NULL;
00721   entry = eol_component_get_entry_data(component);
00722   if (entry == NULL)
00723   {
00724     eol_logger_message(EOL_LOG_WARN,"eol_component:unable to assign entry output\n");
00725     return;
00726   }
00727   if (entry->output == NULL)
00728   {
00729     eol_logger_message(EOL_LOG_WARN,"eol_component:unable to assign output.  NULL pointer specified\n");
00730     return;
00731   }
00732   strncpy(entry->output,entry->buffer->str,entry->bufferLimit);
00733 }

00735 /*
00736 
00737   ****** Makers ******
00738 
00739 */
00740 
00741 void eol_component_make_slider(
00742     eolComponent * component,
00743     eolBool        vertical,
00744     eolLine        sliderFile,
00745     eolLine        sliderHigh,
00746     eolLine        bar,
00747     eolLine        cap1,
00748     eolLine        cap2,
00749     eolVec3D       barColor,
00750     eolVec3D       sliderColor,
00751     eolFloat       startPosition,
00752     eolUint        sliderType
00753   )
00754 {
00755   eolComponentSlider * slider = NULL;
00756   if (!component)return;
00757   eol_component_slider_new(component);
00758   slider = eol_component_get_slider_data(component);
00759   if (slider == NULL)
00760   {
00761     return;
00762   }
00763   
00764   slider->vertical = vertical;
00765   switch(sliderType)
00766   {
00767     case eolSliderCommon:
00768       if (vertical)
00769       {
00770         slider->slider = _eol_component_slider[0];
00771         slider->sliderHigh = _eol_component_slider[1];
00772       }
00773       else
00774       {
00775         slider->slider = _eol_component_slider[2];
00776         slider->sliderHigh = _eol_component_slider[3];
00777       }
00778       break;
00779     case eolSliderStock:
00780     case eolSliderCustom:
00781       slider->slider = eol_sprite_load(sliderFile,-1,-1);
00782       slider->sliderHigh = eol_sprite_load(sliderHigh,-1,-1);
00783       slider->bar = eol_sprite_load(bar,-1,-1);
00784       slider->cap1 = eol_sprite_load(cap1,-1,-1);
00785       slider->cap2 = eol_sprite_load(cap2,-1,-1);
00786       break;
00787   }
00788   slider->sliderType = sliderType;
00789   eol_vec3d_copy(slider->barColor,barColor);
00790   eol_vec3d_copy(slider->sliderColor,sliderColor);
00791   slider->position = slider->oldPosition = startPosition;
00792   
00793   component->data_free = eol_component_slider_free;
00794   component->data_draw = eol_component_slider_draw;
00795   component->data_update = eol_component_slider_update;
00796 }
00797 
00798 void eol_component_make_entry(
00799     eolComponent * component,
00800     char         * output,
00801     eolUint        outputLimit,
00802     eolUint        justify,
00803     eolUint        fontSize,
00804     eolBool        wordWrap,
00805     eolLine        fontName,
00806     eolVec3D       color,
00807     eolFloat       alpha,
00808     eolVec3D       bgcolor
00809   )
00810 {
00811   eolComponentEntry * entry = NULL;
00812   if (!component)return;
00813   eol_component_entry_new(component);
00814   entry = eol_component_get_entry_data(component);
00815   if (entry == NULL)
00816   {
00817     return;
00818   }
00819  
00820   entry->buffer = g_string_new(output);
00821   if (entry->buffer == NULL)
00822   {
00823     eol_logger_message(
00824       EOL_LOG_ERROR,
00825       "eol_component:Failed to duplicate string for new entry\n");
00826     eol_component_entry_free(component);
00827     return;
00828   }
00829   entry->output = output;
00830   entry->bufferLimit = outputLimit;
00831   entry->justify = justify;
00832   entry->fontSize = fontSize;
00833   entry->alpha = alpha;
00834   entry->wordWrap = wordWrap;
00835   eol_vec3d_copy(entry->color,color);
00836   component->data_free = eol_component_entry_free;
00837   component->data_draw = eol_component_entry_draw;
00838   component->data_update = eol_component_entry_update;
00839 }

00841 
00842 void eol_component_make_label(
00843     eolComponent * component,
00844     char         * text,
00845     eolUint        justify,
00846     eolInt         fontSize,
00847     eolBool        wordWrap,
00848     char         * fontName,
00849     eolVec3D       color,
00850     eolFloat       alpha
00851   )
00852 {
00853   eolRect r;
00854   eolComponentLabel * label = NULL;
00855   if (!component)return;
00856   eol_component_label_new(component);
00857   
00858   label = eol_component_get_label_data(component);
00859   if (label == NULL)
00860   {
00861     return;
00862   }
00863 
00864   label->buffer = g_string_new(text);
00865   if (label->buffer == NULL)
00866   {
00867     eol_logger_message(
00868       EOL_LOG_ERROR,
00869       "eol_component:Failed to duplicate string for new label\n");
00870     eol_component_label_free(component);
00871     return;
00872   }
00873   
00874   if ((fontName != NULL)&&(strlen(fontName) > 0))
00875   {
00876     label->font = eol_font_load(fontName,fontSize);
00877     r = eol_font_get_bounds_custom(text,label->font);
00878   }
00879   else
00880   {
00881     r = eol_font_get_bounds(text,fontSize);
00882   }
00883   if (r.w > component->bounds.w)component->bounds.w = r.w;
00884   if (r.h > component->bounds.h)component->bounds.h = r.h;
00885   label->justify = justify;
00886   label->fontSize = fontSize;
00887   label->alpha = alpha;
00888   label->wordWrap = wordWrap;
00889   eol_vec3d_copy(label->color,color);
00890   component->data_free = eol_component_label_free;
00891   component->data_draw = eol_component_label_draw;
00892 }
00893 
00894 void eol_component_entry_new(eolComponent *component)
00895 {
00896   if (component->componentData != NULL)
00897   {
00898     eol_logger_message(
00899       EOL_LOG_WARN,
00900       "eol_component:tried to make a label out of an existing component\n");
00901     return;
00902   }
00903   component->componentData = malloc(sizeof(eolComponentEntry));
00904   if (component->componentData == NULL)
00905   {
00906     eol_logger_message(
00907       EOL_LOG_ERROR,
00908       "eol_actor: failed to allocate data for new label\n");
00909     return;
00910   }
00911   memset(component->componentData,0,sizeof(eolComponentEntry));
00912   component->type = eolEntryComponent;
00913 }

00973 
00974 void eol_slider_set_position(eolComponent *comp, eolFloat newPos)
00975 {
00976   eolComponentSlider * slider = NULL;
00977   slider = eol_component_get_slider_data(comp);
00978   if (!slider)return;
00979   if (newPos < 0)newPos = 0;
00980   if (newPos > 1)newPos = 1;
00981   slider->position = newPos;
00982 }

01008                           "",

01013                           eol_vec3d(1,1,1),
01014                           startPosition,
01015                           eolSliderCommon
01016                           );
01017   }
01018   else
01019   {
01020     
01021     return eol_slider_new(id,
01022                           name,
01023                           rect,
01024                           bounds,
01025                           vertical,
01026                           "",
01027                           "",
01028                           "",
01029                           "",
01030                           "",
01031                           barColor,
01032                           eol_vec3d(1,1,1),
01033                           startPosition,
01034                           eolSliderCommon
01035                           );
01036   }

01038 
01039 eolComponent *eol_slider_new(
01040     eolUint       id,
01041     eolWord       name,
01042     eolRectFloat  rect,
01043     eolRect       bounds,
01044     eolBool       vertical,
01045     eolLine       slider,
01046     eolLine       sliderHigh,
01047     eolLine       bar,
01048     eolLine       cap1,
01049     eolLine       cap2,
01050     eolVec3D      barColor,
01051     eolVec3D      sliderColor,
01052     eolFloat      startPosition,
01053     eolUint       sliderType
01054   )
01055 {
01056   eolComponent *component = NULL;
01057   component = eol_component_new();
01058   if (!component)return NULL;
01059   
01060   eol_component_make_slider(component,
01061                             vertical,
01062                             slider,
01063                             sliderHigh,
01064                             bar,
01065                             cap1,
01066                             cap2,
01067                             barColor,
01068                             sliderColor,
01069                             startPosition,
01070                             sliderType);
01071   if (component->componentData == NULL)
01072   {
01073     eol_component_free(&component);
01074     return NULL;
01075   }
01076   component->id = id;
01077   eol_word_cpy(component->name,name);
01078   component->canHasFocus = eolTrue;
01079   component->type = eolSliderComponent;
01080   eol_rectf_copy(&component->rect,rect);
01081   eol_component_get_rect_from_bounds(&component->bounds,bounds, rect);
01082   if ((rect.w <= 1) && (rect.w >= 0))
01083     component->bounds.w = bounds.w * rect.w;
01084   else component->bounds.w = rect.w;
01085   if ((rect.h <= 1)  && (rect.h >= 0))
01086     component->bounds.h = bounds.h * rect.h;
01087   else component->bounds.h = rect.h;
01088   return component;
01089 
01090 }

01092 eolComponent *eol_label_new(
01093     eolUint        id,
01094     eolWord        name,
01095     eolRectFloat   rect,
01096     eolRect        bounds,
01097     eolBool        canHasFocus,
01098     char         * text,
01099     eolUint        justify,
01100     eolBool        wordWrap,
01101     eolInt         fontSize,
01102     char         * fontName,
01103     eolVec3D       color,
01104     eolFloat       alpha
01105   )
01106 {
01107   eolComponent *component = NULL;
01108   if (!text)return NULL;
01109   component = eol_component_new();
01110   if (!component)return NULL;
01111   eol_component_get_rect_from_bounds(&component->bounds,bounds, rect);
01112   eol_component_make_label(
01113     component,
01114     text,
01115     justify,
01116     fontSize,
01117     wordWrap,
01118     fontName,
01119     color,
01120     alpha
01121   );
01122   if (component->componentData == NULL)
01123   {
01124     eol_component_free(&component);
01125     return NULL;
01126   }
01127   component->id = id;
01128   strncpy(component->name,name,EOLWORDLEN);
01129   eol_rectf_copy(&component->rect,rect);
01130   component->canHasFocus = canHasFocus;
01131   component->type = eolLabelComponent;
01132   return component;
01133 }

01208 
01209 /*utility functions*/
01210 void eol_component_get_rect_from_bounds(eolRect *rect,eolRect canvas, eolRectFloat bounds)
01211 {
01212   eolRectFloat rbounds;
01213   if (!rect)return;
01214 
01215   if (bounds.x < -1)
01216   {
01217     /*raw number from right edge*/
01218     rbounds.x = (canvas.w + bounds.x) / (float)canvas.w;
01219   }
01220   else if (bounds.x < 0)
01221   {
01222     /*percent of canvas from right*/
01223     rbounds.x = 1 + bounds.x;
01224   }
01225   else if (bounds.x <= 1)
01226   {
01227     /*percent of canvas from left*/
01228     rbounds.x = bounds.x;
01229   }
01230   else
01231   {
01232     rbounds.x = bounds.x / (float)canvas.w;
01233   }
01234 
01235   if (bounds.y < -1)
01236   {
01237     /*raw number from right edge*/
01238     rbounds.y = (canvas.h + bounds.y) / (float)canvas.h;
01239   }
01240   else if (bounds.y < 0)
01241   {
01242     /*percent of canvas from right*/
01243     rbounds.y = 1 + bounds.y;
01244   }
01245   else if (bounds.y <= 1)
01246   {
01247     /*percent of canvas from left*/
01248     rbounds.y = bounds.y;
01249   }
01250   else
01251   {
01252     rbounds.y = bounds.y / (float)canvas.h;
01253   }
01254 
01255 
01256   if (bounds.w <= 0)
01257   {
01258     /*fill to end*/
01259     rbounds.w = 1 - rbounds.x;
01260   }
01261   else if (bounds.w > 1)
01262   {
01263     /*exact size*/
01264     rbounds.w = bounds.w / (float)canvas.w;
01265   }
01266   else
01267   {
01268     /*% of canvas*/
01269     rbounds.w = bounds.w;
01270   }
01271 
01272   if (bounds.h <= 0)
01273   {
01274     /*fill to end*/
01275     rbounds.h = 1 - rbounds.y;
01276   }
01277   else if (bounds.h > 1)
01278   {
01279     /*exact size*/
01280     rbounds.h = bounds.h / (float)canvas.h;
01281   }
01282   else
01283   {
01284     /*% of canvas*/
01285     rbounds.h = bounds.h;
01286   }
01287   
01288   rect->x = canvas.x + (rbounds.x * canvas.w);
01289   rect->y = canvas.y + (rbounds.y * canvas.h);
01290   rect->w = canvas.w * rbounds.w;
01291   rect->h = canvas.h * rbounds.h;
01292 }
